summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Sixth Avenue Northwest, from West Forty-fifth Street to West Fifty-fifth Street; Fifth Avenue Northwest and Fourth Avenue Northwest, each from West Fifty-fifth Street to West Sixty-fifth Street; North and West Sixty-second Street and North and West Fifty-second Street, each from Eighth Avenue Northwest to Phinney Avenue; West Fifty-fifth Street, from Sixth Avenue Northwest to Fourth Avenue Northwest; West Fiftieth Street, from Sixth Avenue Northwest on south to Sixth Avenue N.W. on north; Third Avenue Northwest, from West Fifty-second Street on west to West Fifty-second Street on east; and Greenwood Avenue, from West Fifty-second Street on west to West Fifty-second Street on east, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 511 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
